comment: He did not even give his lectures himself. The asisstant was helping him out in class but still the grades were graded by him and he is a tough grader. Everything feels harder than it should be.

Sometimes rude :(
Very lecture heavy, so many group assignments.
Groups r 5-6 people, spread out in a line. Points r taken off if u split the papers in the packet, often its 2-3 people sitting doing nothing & 2-3 people do work, then switching.
U have to write ur VERY specific contributions down or u get told off. Frustrating but whatever.

Please choose a different professor, especially for this online lab. He is an extremely tough grader. He will almost cut your grade in half if you forget to add small details. I feel like this lab was unnecessarily harder than it should've been. He doesn't accept late work at all, even if it's just 5 minutes late.

Would definitely take his class again. His lectures are really good, available to connect outside class hours, and very responsive to emails. His exams are tough, but manageable if you come to class and study. And in general, he is a nice person so you feel comfortable going to him about the material and asking questions in class.
